select.if:
select count(*) as total_count from( select * from giving_page_tb where 1 = 1
and giving_name like concat("%", #{searchValue},"%")
union all
select * from funding_page_tb where 1 = 1
and funding_name like concat("%", #{searchValue},"%") ) as combined_tables;

select count(*) as total_count from giving_page_tb where 1 = 1
and giving_name like concat("%", #{searchValue},"%")

select count(*) as total_count from funding_page_tb where 1 = 1
and funding_name like concat("%", #{searchValue},"%")

select gpt.giving_page_id as page_id, gpt.register_date, gpt.giving_name as page_title, ct.center_name as user_name, if(Now() < end_date, '진행중','종료') as event_status, sum(gt.giving_total) as page_total_amount, gpt.main_img_url as img_url from giving_page_tb gpt left outer join center_tb ct on (ct.center_id = gpt.center_id) left outer join giver_tb gt on (gt.giving_page_id = gpt.giving_page_id) group by gpt.giving_page_id Having 1 = 1
and giving_name like concat("%", #{searchValue},"%")
union all select ft.funding_id AS page_id, ft.register_date, ft.funding_name AS page_title, ut.name AS user_name, IF(NOW() < ft.register_date, '진행중', '종료') AS event_status, sum(fdt.reward_price)as page_total_amount, ft.main_img_url AS img_url from funding_page_tb ft left outer join user_tb ut on(ut.user_id = ft.user_id) left outer join reward_tb rwt on(rwt.funding_id = ft.funding_id) left outer join (select rt.reward_id, rt.reward_price from funder_tb ft left outer join reward_tb rt on(rt.reward_id = ft.reward_id) ) fdt on(fdt.reward_id = rwt.reward_id) group by ft.funding_id, ft.funding_name, ut.name, event_status, ft.main_img_url Having 1 = 1
and funding_name like concat("%", #{searchValue},"%")
order by register_date desc limit #{index}, 20;
